text_block_list.text:
The day following the Selection Race, I visited 
the training course to check on Mejiro Mcqueen.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Haa… haa… haa…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
This is not good. I can't muster strength into my legs… 
This is the same unpleasant feeling as yesterday.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: …… Whew.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Eh?!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
You are… 
Excuse me, who are you?
choice_data_list: Nice to meet you, I'm a new trainer.
Nice to meet you, I'm a new trainer.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Ah, a trainer! Could it be that you came to oversee my training?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: It's an honor. I appreciate you going out of your way to come.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
However… I would like to ask you one question. 
Why did you become interested in me?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
In the recent Selection Race, I displayed a pathetic performance 
that brought disgrace to the Mejiro name.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Given this, why do you…?
choice_data_list: I was drawn to the strength of your spirit.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
My spirit…? I see, you were able to see my 
inner spirit. Thank you for the kind words.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
A proud horsegirl of the Mejiro family must possess 
a strong and unwavering spirit at all times…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I would be content if I can at least demonstrate that.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
However, whether you decide to be my trainer or not, 
I would like to request that you make your decision after 
observing my performance.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
As a horsegirl from the Mejiro bloodline, I 
have ambitious goals that I must achieve.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Yes, my goal is to conquer the Tenno Sho race.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Of course, this is a feat that cannot be accomplished without 
a proper relationship of trust with my trainer.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
In other words, I cannot realize my goals if 
my trainer does not believe in my ability.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Therefore, please finalize your decision 
after judging my running performance.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Should you believe you will be able to raise me to 
become a horsegirl worthy of the Mejiro name.
choice_data_list: You must be very proud of the Mejiro name.
You must be very proud of the Mejiro name.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Yes! I am truly grateful to have been born in this family.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Being surrounded by a wonderful family and carrying the 
expectations of those who have supported us for generations…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: It's all thanks to that I am standing here today.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Therefore, I want to fulfill my role as 
a Mejiro horsegirl by securing victory.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
For that reason, I humbly request that you make your 
decision after judging my running performance.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Thank you very much. I may have shown a rather disappointing 
performance the other day, but allow me to make up for it here!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Then, I will be on my way. Please witness the result of the 
training that has been instilled in me by the Mejiro family!

Mejiro Mcqueen commenced training 
with a determined look on her face.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Ha! Ha! Ha! Ha! Ha!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Whew…

Perhaps due to being trained from a young age, her form 
was incredibly beautiful with no wasted movements.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Now… one more!
The endurance and mental fortitude required in long distance…

Certainly, with her abilities it wouldn't be out of reach to win 
the prestigious stayer's race, "Tenno Sho (Spring)".
However…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Huff… huff… What did you think of my training?
choice_data_list:
Do you have difficulty getting 
strength into your legs?

Do you have difficulty getting 
strength into your legs?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Hehh? Oh… um, well, that is—

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: … Uuugh.
choice_data_list: As I thought, your stomach isn't feeling well?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Ah, n-no! My stomach feels fine!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
It's um… I sincerely apologize! 
I'm off to run another lap!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: This time for sure…!

Even after continuing her training, Mejiro Mcqueen's 
condition did not seem to improve much.
